China stopped importing spiny lobsters from Vietnam.
Authorities of the Ministry of Agriculture and
Rural Development have just discussed
online with the Department of Animal and Plant Quarantine Supervision
Department through
China, according to which Vietnamese spiny lobsters
stopped exporting to this market due to
specific new regulations from January this year.
China has amended the law on protecting
wild animals, which prohibits the
use and trade of spiny lobsters
and other species.  Other species in the list of
endangered wild animals that need to be protected
in this new regulation include lobsters.
Chinese farmed cotton lobsters require
clear proof that the farming process does not
use naturally exploited seed sources

mouse information related to the
Titanic, the dinner menu
served on the first class cabin of the
famous ship was just sold for
84,000 copies equivalent to 103,000
US dollars at an auction room in the West  In the south of
England, the expert in charge at the
Henry andrich Andon auction room in Wilshire County
said the menu content included
beef and mallard duck dishes. The surface of the
menu was decorated with red White
Starline pennants. However, the lines  The
original gilded lettering has faded
significantly according to Mr. Andrew Alrich the menu was
found in a photo album of the late
Canadian historian Len Stevenson Although the content
is partly faded due to water absorption,
this is believed to be  The only surviving menu for the
April 11 dinner on the Titanic's first class cabin.
Previously,
this auction house had successfully auctioned off
two other items related to the
Titanic: a Swiss pocket watch and
a  Blankets with striped motifs sold
for 97,000 and 96,000 copies respectively.
On November 15, the

According to investigation results, Vu Thi Thanh,
born in 1976, is the keeper of the
Go Wo district post office of Kien Giang province. Due to
external debts she could not

embezzled 1,000,000 VND.  5 billion VND
after receiving the product, Thanh t returned
